name: The Baby Santa Claus Calls Me
name_original: The Baby Santa Claus Calls Me
description:
Calling The Baby Santa claus by click on call button and make fun with your friends. Baby call is for fun, Share close, let think that phoning your favorite santa baby or santa puppy! Make fun of a lot of fun! In the game you can choose different calls for a call! A real blast and a voice straight out of the tube!

Features:

• Simulate the fake Incoming call from baby & puppy.
• baby & puppy sounds.
• Phone Ringtone.
• Options to decline, or, accept call.
• Great as a game.
• Easy to use.
• NO need for Wi-Fi to play for more fun.


Enjoy with your friends !!!

Thank you for playing with us leave us your feedback and we will try to make our game even better and more interesting!
